value:
Of course I'm not getting married.
This is merely a costume for a bridal
festival of sorts.

I hear that wedding ceremonies
feature all manner of fancy banquets,
but the bride has no time to eat.$k$pIsn't that just tragic? She is the star of
the wedding, after all.

Sigrun and Tanith of the Holy Guard
are my personal guards. What would
they say if they saw me wearing this?

It would cause quite the episode were
I to step on my dress's hem and trip,
so I will allow you to escort me.$k$pLend me your arm. With your support,
I will not fall.

I heard that in a wedding ceremony,
the couple pledges their eternal love
with a kiss. And a kiss is... It's...

You may kneel, if you wish—you are
standing in the presence of...$k$pHm, no... I should deliver the greeting
from $Nf first.

Is this because of that rumored
power of love?

Even dressed like this, I continue
to exceed expectations.

I can't demonstrate my full power
in this silly dress!

I've grown? How much, exactly?
Do I need a new dress?

You stand in the presence of Sanaki,
37th Empress of Begnion. I am the
Apos— M-my dress?$k$pIt is nothing you should concern
yourself with. Do not interrupt me!

I am the 37th Empress of Begnion. It
is for this purpose I was born and to
this end I was raised.$k$pI am different from the common
person... So my wedding, too, will be
different from the common person's.$k$pMy groom will not be chosen based
upon feelings alone.$k$pHowever, I think my desire to be with
someone I love... Is the same as any
other person's...$k$pSpending this time with you has
allowed me to realize this. And
someday, when I, too...$k$pH-hey, you better not tell anyone I'm
telling you all this! This is our secret,
got it?!$k$p*ahem* Understood?
それっ！
ゆくぞ！
きゃああっ！
…おのれ…！
Take my love!
And some more love!
Unforgivable impertinence!
Bow before our might!
Ooh... Too much!
ふふふっ
This outfit is just for the festival. Don't get any weird ideas.
What do you think you're doing? Is that how you treat a bride?
I'm not a kid! I know about love and...things. Really, I do.
OK. I will hear your thoughts on my outfit!
I look pretty? You have not earned the right to speak on such matters!

Someday, I'll dress like this, but for real, and—
You heard nothing!
Tell me—why do people make vows of love?
I'll manage!
Pledge your love!
Happily ever after...
